name: Iceberg Earth
description:
The year is 2134.  Earth has been pushed to Mars' orbit by aliens, who now seek to eliminate the remainder of the population through intense firepower.  Survive in a harrowing reality, with the looming threat of annihilation constantly (and literally) above your head at all times.  

THE WORLD

Explore a small open world filled with secrets.  Attempt to decipher the landscape as you struggle against the ever-increasing mobs of extraterrestrial origin.  There are varying regions, from deep valleys to stark cliffs and wide, flat ice sheets.

THE ALIENS

Nobody knows where they came from, but they're here to stay.  They come in all flavours, from the fast and nimble to the big and strong.  Covering is key when fighting against the stronger ones, and being in the open at night might be the death of you.

OTHER FEATURES

There are multiple difficulties, from the Sunday stroll of Easy mode to the brutal and unforgiving Merciless mode.

MINUMUM SPECS

16GB RAM

NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 GPU

AMD Ryzen 5 3000 Series/Intel i5 Processor
